item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 7, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Every V4 UUID (937 points | 291 comments)
2. Postgres for everything (e/Postgres) (37 points | 23 comments)
3. The Curse of Recursion: Training on generated data makes models forget (2023) (31 points | 17 comments)
4. MultiQueue-Based FPGA Routing: Relaxed A* Priority Ordering-Improved Parallelism [pdf] (7 points | 1 comment)
5. The Birmingham Blade: geographically tailored urban wind turbine designed by AI (7 points | 3 comments)
6. Next-level frosted glass with backdrop-filter (152 points | 19 comments)
7. Biggest shell programs (80 points | 34 comments)
8. : The Dialog Element (222 points | 92 comments)
9. My second year without a job (205 points | 260 comments)
10. Lies I was told about collab editing, Part 1: Algorithms for offline editing (171 points | 53 comments)
11. 21 Algol 60 Compilers in 1962 (7 points | discuss)
12. OpenAI Reinforcement Fine-Tuning Research Program (154 points | 38 comments)
13. Structured Outputs with Ollama (150 points | 33 comments)
14. Rivian is opening its charging network to other EVs (217 points | 207 comments)
15. Does Your Code Pass the Turkey Test? (2008) (91 points | 68 comments)
16. Mistakes as a new manager (154 points | 55 comments)
17. Install postmarketOS on Android phone and use Docker as a home server (244 points | 95 comments)

19. Precursors of Copernicus' heliocentric theory (6 points | discuss)
20. DSPy – Programming–not prompting–LMs (117 points | 22 comments)
21. Nucleotide Transformer: building robust foundation models for human genomics (4 points | discuss)
22. Union types ('enum types') would be complicated in Go (20 points | 25 comments)
23. Tell HN: Alaska Airlines website exposes passenger data (50 points | 27 comments)
24. Tokyo is set to introduce a four-day workweek for government employees (496 points | 253 comments)
25. Deep dive into finding RSS feeds (101 points | 36 comments)
26. Arc Prize 2024 Winners and Technical Report (109 points | 40 comments)
27. Romanian court annuls result of presidential election first round (409 points | 793 comments)
28. Debian opens a can of username worms (199 points | 228 comments)
29. RNA-targeting CRISPR reveals that noncoding RNAs are not 'junk' (109 points | 64 comments)
30. How to Bypass WhatsApp Web's Locked Chat Feature (51 points | 14 comments)
